attributes.review: This app is of horrible quality as is the president at this point he disgust me u saw one post on Facebook about something he has done oh boy I used to be a supporter but know I hope biden wins.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: I don’t even have the words to describe how horrible this is😣 i would give it zero stars if that was an option
attributes.title: Absolutely Awful

attributes.review: I hate this app. I thought I would be able to support my president by getting this app as it is my duty to support my president but it is the worst😡😡. I will never use this app again.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!!

attributes.review: This app should have came with a warning label. It’s just repulsive. If you have respect for anyone, anyone at all, please just move along. I promise you are not missing out on anything.
attributes.title: HARMFUL

attributes.review: I looked at the reviews and was like let me check this out and I realized why people were giving this app such terrible reviews and I to agree with all of the bad reviews
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😡

attributes.review: I feel like this is so disrespectful because I really😖wanted to support trump so bad🥺😞but the app kept on crashing and I think it’s disrespectful cause I am crying right now😭😢😓that I can’t support my king 👑 👩🏻‍🦯
attributes.title: Ugh

attributes.review: Opened it once and I regret it. When I went into this app I started to sweat and it was hard to breathe, I stood up and passed out. I woke up in the hospital. The doctor said it was this app that caused it. Unbelievable.
attributes.title: This app landed me in the ICU

attributes.review: Listen im an all right boomer who LOVE to drink racism juice. BUT i gave them my number and was FLOODED with provocative women AND men asking for a good time. I was APPALLED. Not only were women asking for a good time but men asking for men! Ive never been so disgusted and disappointed in my lord, my leader, my savior trump.
attributes.title: DISGUSTED

attributes.review: This one of the worst apps a person could get, I wouldn’t even recommend it to my worst enemy. Just everything is AWFUL about this app.
attributes.title: Awful!!!

attributes.review: The wort app ever!!!! This app was good at first but then it started having bugs and glitches and then it told me to KILL my family and to also drown my dogs because they could not say TrUmP 2020
attributes.title: Bad
